data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Choiseul, Solomon Islands to the gospel today.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Choiseul, Solomon Islands
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Choiseul to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in Choiseul, Solomon Islands.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Choiseul to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 8,236 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Choiseul.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Choiseul, Solomon Islands to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Choiseul. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.section_summary:
the state of Choiseul, Solomon Islands has a population of 26,400.

We estimate Choiseul has 8,236 people who might know Jesus, 17,043 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,122 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Choiseul, Solomon Islands to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.
